long_description: Screws come loose-or refuse to loosen-at the worst times. The compact Gerber GDC Zip Driver tool keeps the right screwdriver at your fingertips when you need it. Rotating wheel holds two flat screwdrivers (1/8 in. and 3/16 in.) and two Phillips screwdrivers (#1 and #2). Simply choose a bit and snap it securely in position. Lightweight, grippy handle resists slippage; stainless steel bits will hold up to serious torque. Lanyard attachment and quick-release clip makes it easy to remove the tool from a keychain or zipper; compact size won't hog valuable space in your pocket or bike bag.
short_description: Screws come loose-or refuse to loosen-at the worst times. The compact Gerber GDC Zip Driver tool keeps the right screwdriver at your fingertips when you need it.
